name: CyberCum: Pussy Attack❗️
description:
CyberCum: Pussy Attack❗️ is an adult exciting visual novel that combines elements of Match-3 gameplay. In this game, you'll enter the world of the near future and follow the main character, Craig, a famous porn actor who has invested a huge amount of money in enhancing his body to perform the most unusual scenes in his work.
One day, Craig wakes up in a junkyard and discovers that his precious cybernetic parts have been stolen and replaced with cheap implants. Investigating the disappearance of his cybernetic parts leads him to a local criminal authority who now owns his body. To regain his body, he must fight against two bodyguards who protect his opponent.
You play as Craig and help him collect unique items, complete levels, and use various Match-3 combinations to defeat the bodyguards. As you progress through the levels, you'll also have the opportunity to upgrade Craig's body and skills to improve his chances of winning.
Additionally, the game also features exciting porn scenes where Craig demonstrates his unique skills and body. This is an additional bonus that adds to the game's atmosphere and character interaction.
Overall, CyberCum: Pussy Attack is an engaging and exciting game that immerses you in Craig's incredible world and forces you to use all your skills and logical abilities to help him regain his body.
This content may violate our content policy. If you believe this to be in error, please submit your feedback — your input will aid our research in this area.
Features:
Beautiful background artwork
Complex dating sim gameplay mixed with a story-driven Visual Novel.
A Multitude of Sexy Situations
Plenty of lewd scenes with various girls
Life2D animated characters
